title: Flip Box - Usage Examples
description: Interactive flip boxes with front and back sides that flip on hover, perfect for revealing content, team bios, product features, and engaging interactions

examples.name: Team Member Bio (Horizontal Flip)
examples.description: Team member photo on front, bio details on back with CTA button
examples.visualDescription: Front: centered photo with name overlay. Back: bio paragraph with purple gradient background and 'View Profile' button. Flips horizontally left-to-right on hover.

innerBlocks.note: Team member photo for front side

attrs.content: Jane is our lead designer with 10 years of experience in UX/UI. She specializes in creating beautiful, user-centered designs.

examples.useCase: Team pages, about sections, staff directories, agency websites

examples.name: Product Feature Reveal (Vertical Flip)
examples.description: Product icon and title on front, detailed features on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: large icon with 'Premium Features' title. Back: bullet list of features with 'Learn More' button. Flips vertically top-to-bottom on hover.
examples.useCase: Product showcases, feature comparisons, pricing tiers, service offerings

examples.name: Service Card (Horizontal Flip with Icon)
examples.description: Service icon and tagline on front, description and pricing on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: centered design icon with 'Web Design' title and tagline. Back: service description with 'Starting at $2,500' and contact button.

attrs.content: Our web design service includes custom layouts, responsive design, brand integration, and ongoing support.

examples.useCase: Service pages, agency portfolios, pricing showcases, consulting offers

examples.name: Stats Reveal (Vertical Flip)
examples.description: Company stat on front, context explanation on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: large '500+' number with 'Projects Completed' label. Back: timeline description of projects with button to portfolio.

attrs.content: Over 500 successful projects delivered since 2015, ranging from startups to enterprise clients across 20+ industries.

examples.useCase: About pages, stats showcases, achievement displays, homepage metrics

examples.name: Before/After Showcase (Horizontal Flip with Images)
examples.description: Before image on front, after image on back for transformation showcase
examples.visualDescription: Front: 'Before' labeled image with subtle 'Hover to see after' prompt. Back: 'After' labeled image showing transformation with 'See More' button.
examples.useCase: Portfolio transformations, design showcases, renovation projects, fitness transformations

examples.name: Pricing Tier Card (Vertical Flip)
examples.description: Plan name and price on front, features list on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: 'Pro Plan' title with '$49/mo' large price display. Back: feature checklist with 'Get Started' button and blue gradient.
examples.useCase: Pricing pages, plan comparisons, subscription tiers, membership levels

examples.name: Interactive FAQ Card (Horizontal Flip)
examples.description: Question on front, detailed answer on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: question mark icon with FAQ question text. Back: answer paragraph with 'Read More FAQs' button.

attrs.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, contact us within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.

examples.useCase: FAQ sections, help centers, support pages, knowledge bases

examples.name: Portfolio Piece (Vertical Flip with Multiple Blocks)
examples.description: Project thumbnail on front, project details on back
examples.visualDescription: Front: project screenshot with overlay title. Back: project description, technologies used, and 'View Case Study' button with orange gradient.

attrs.content: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform with custom checkout, inventory management, and analytics dashboard.

examples.useCase: Portfolio pages, case studies, project showcases, design galleries

validationRules.boxHeight: Recommended - minimum height for flip box (responsive: md, sm, xs)
validationRules.backAlign: 'left', 'center', or 'right' - content alignment on back side
validationRules.backCarouselBtn: Boolean - true enables CTA button on back side
validationRules.btnCarouselStyle: Button style when backCarouselBtn is true (e.g., 'style-7', 'style-8', 'style-11')
validationRules.btnCarouselIconType: 'none' or 'icon' - determines if button has icon
validationRules.btnCarouselIconPosition: 'before' or 'after' - icon position relative to button text
validationRules.innerBlocks: Front and back content must be specified via innerBlocks - accepts any Gutenberg block

warnings: flipType determines animation direction - 'horizontal' flips left-right, 'vertical' flips top-bottom
boxHeight should be set to ensure consistent flip box size - without it, height varies based on content
backAlign only affects back side content - front side alignment controlled by inner blocks
backCarouselBtn must be true to show button on back - button styling attributes ignored if false
btnCarouselStyle requires backCarouselBtn:true to take effect
btnCarouselIconName requires btnCarouselIconType:'icon' - ignored if iconType is 'none'
innerBlocks organization: Front side content should be added first, back side content second
Flip animation triggers on hover - ensure users know flip boxes are interactive (visual cues helpful)
boxHeight should accommodate both front AND back content - taller content will overflow if height too small
Mobile considerations: Flip on hover doesn't work on mobile - consider tap/touch alternative
Multiple flip boxes in row should have consistent boxHeight for visual alignment
Button URL configuration happens in WordPress admin - not exposed in block attributes here
Front and back sides rendered as separate divs - styling applied via global styles or block styling settings
commonMistakes: Not setting boxHeight - causes inconsistent flip box sizes in grid layouts
Using backCarouselBtn:false but setting button styling - button won't appear without backCarouselBtn:true
Setting btnCarouselIconName without btnCarouselIconType:'icon' - icon won't display
Forgetting to organize innerBlocks by front/back sides - front content should precede back content
Using too much content on back side without sufficient boxHeight - content gets cut off
Not testing on mobile - flip animation doesn't trigger on touch devices (needs tap handling)
Inconsistent boxHeight across flip boxes in same row - creates misaligned grid
Using complex nested blocks on back side causing performance issues - keep back content simple
Expecting button click to work - button requires URL configuration in admin, not just attributes
Not providing visual cue that flip box is interactive - users may not know to hover
bestPractices: **Box Height:** Set consistent boxHeight across all flip boxes in same grid (e.g., all 400px)
**Flip Direction:** Use horizontal flip for left-right reveals, vertical for top-bottom reveals
**Content Balance:** Keep front side simple (image + title), back side detailed (description + button)
**Mobile Experience:** Consider adding subtle 'Tap to flip' hint for mobile users
**Button Usage:** Always enable backCarouselBtn on back side for clear CTA
**Icon Selection:** Choose icons that hint at flip action (arrows, question marks) or relate to content
**Alignment:** Center-align back content for visual balance, left-align for text-heavy content
**Grid Layouts:** Place 2-4 flip boxes in tp-row + tp-column for comparison showcases
**Responsive Heights:** Adjust boxHeight for mobile (md:400px → xs:300px) to save vertical space
**Visual Cues:** Add subtle border or shadow to indicate flip boxes are interactive
**Animation Speed:** Default flip animation is smooth - don't override without testing
**Content Length:** Limit back side to 2-3 paragraphs max - too much text overwhelms
**Color Contrast:** Ensure text on back side contrasts with background for readability
**Button Text:** Use action-oriented button text ('Learn More', 'Get Started', 'View Details')
**Image Optimization:** Optimize front side images for faster flip reveal
**Accessibility:** Add aria-labels to flip boxes describing front/back content
**Performance:** Limit to 6-8 flip boxes per page to avoid CSS transform overload
**Testing:** Test hover behavior across browsers - 3D transforms may vary

horizontal.description: Flips left-to-right (or right-to-left depending on implementation)
horizontal.bestFor: Natural reading flow, before/after reveals, side-by-side comparisons
horizontal.visualCharacteristics: Card rotates on Y-axis, revealing back side from left or right
horizontal.userExperience: Intuitive flip motion, widely familiar interaction pattern

vertical.bestFor: Stacked content reveals, pricing cards, feature disclosures
vertical.visualCharacteristics: Card rotates on X-axis, revealing back side from top or bottom
vertical.userExperience: Less common but engaging, works well for hierarchical reveals

responsivePatterns.description: Larger height on desktop, smaller on mobile
3 flip boxes in row on desktop, stack vertically on mobile
responsivePatterns.setup: Use tp-row + tp-column with responsive widths (4-4-4 desktop → 12-12-12 mobile)

responsivePatterns.description: Add CSS to trigger flip on tap for mobile devices (not hover)
responsivePatterns.implementation: Use click event listener for touch devices

accessibilityNotes: **Keyboard Navigation:** Flip boxes should be keyboard accessible - pressing Enter/Space should trigger flip
**ARIA Labels:** Add aria-label describing flip box purpose ('Team member bio flip card')
**Screen Readers:** Screen readers should access both front and back content without flipping
**Focus States:** Ensure visible focus indicator when flip box is focused via keyboard
**Motion Sensitivity:** 3D flip animation may trigger vestibular disorders - provide reduced-motion alternative
**Button Accessibility:** Back side button must be keyboard accessible and have descriptive text
**Color Contrast:** Ensure text on both front and back sides meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 ratio)
**Interactive Cues:** Provide non-color cues that flip box is interactive (icon, border, etc.)
**Mobile Touch:** Touch users need tap to flip - ensure flip boxes respond to touch events
**Alt Text:** Images on front/back sides need descriptive alt attributes
performanceConsiderations: **3D Transforms:** CSS 3D transforms are hardware accelerated - performant but test on low-end devices
**Image Optimization:** Optimize images on both front and back sides to reduce load time
**Limit Count:** Maximum 6-8 flip boxes per page to avoid CSS transform overhead
**Lazy Loading:** Consider lazy loading back side content until flip is triggered
**Animation Performance:** Default flip animation uses CSS transitions - avoid adding JavaScript animations
**Mobile Considerations:** 3D transforms on mobile can be slower - test on actual devices
**Content Complexity:** Simple back side content (text + button) performs better than complex nested blocks
**Font Loading:** Ensure fonts load before flip boxes render to avoid FOUT during flip
**Z-Index Stacking:** Multiple flip boxes in grid may have z-index conflicts during flip - test overlaps
**Browser Compatibility:** Test 3D transforms across browsers (works in all modern browsers)
integrationPatterns: **Team Page Grid:** Place 3-4 flip boxes in tp-row for team member bios (photo front, bio back)
**Service Showcase:** Use flip boxes in 3-column grid for service offerings (icon front, details back)
**Pricing Comparison:** Flip boxes for pricing tiers (price front, features list back)
**Portfolio Gallery:** Flip boxes in masonry grid for project showcases (screenshot front, details back)
**FAQ Section:** Flip boxes for common questions (question front, answer back) as alternative to accordion
**Product Features:** Grid of flip boxes highlighting product features (feature name front, description back)
**Before/After:** Use for transformation showcases (before photo front, after photo back)
**Stats Showcase:** Flip boxes with number counters on front, context on back

commonPatterns.description: Photo + name on front, bio + social links on back
commonPatterns.setup: Front: tp-image + tp-heading. Back: tp-pro-paragraph + tp-social-icons + button

commonPatterns.description: Plan name + price on front, features list on back
commonPatterns.setup: Front: tp-heading (plan) + tp-heading (price). Back: tp-stylist-list + button

commonPatterns.description: Icon + title on front, description + link on back
Project screenshot on front, details on back
commonPatterns.setup: Front: tp-image + tp-heading. Back: tp-heading + tp-pro-paragraph + button

commonPatterns.description: Question on front, answer on back
commonPatterns.setup: Front: tp-icon-box (question mark + question). Back: tp-pro-paragraph (answer)

commonPatterns.description: Before image on front, after image on back
commonPatterns.setup: Front: tp-heading ('Before') + tp-image. Back: tp-heading ('After') + tp-image + button
